text: pinnar â€˜â€˜ni ovvoru puspattiliruntum pucittu, unatiraivan unakku arivitta elitana valiyil (un kuttukkul) otunkic cel (enak kattalai ittan). Itanal atan vayirriliruntu pala nirankalaiyutaiya oru panam (ten) veliyakiratu. Atil manitarkalukku nivaranamuntu. Niccayamaka itilum cintikkakkutiya makkalukku or attatci irukkiratu
